heading: HR02404
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE MUSLIM PEOPLE, ALONG WITH CHRISTIANS, LUMADS, AND OTHER FAITH, TO PRAY FOR PEACE IN THE BANGSAMORO HOMELAND AS THE VOTERS PREPARE TO RATIFY REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11054 OR THE ORGANIC LAW FOR THE BANGSAMORO AUTONOMOUS REGION IN MUSLIM MINDANAO
status: Pending with the Committee on MUSLIM AFFAIRS since 2019-01-21

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02404
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE MUSLIM PEOPLE, ALONG WITH CHRISTIANS, LUMADS, AND OTHER FAITH, TO PRAY FOR PEACE IN THE BANGSAMORO HOMELAND AS THE VOTERS PREPARE TO RATIFY REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11054 OR THE ORGANIC LAW FOR THE BANGSAMORO AUTONOMOUS REGION IN MUSLIM MINDANAO
